Law Enforcement - City of Hackberry



[Skip to content](https://cityofhackberry.net/law-enforcement/#content)

You may pay-by-phone using our automated phone number 24/7 @ 1.888.409.2849. Please have your account number and card information. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ACH PAYMENTS.

You may pay-by-phone using our automated phone number 24/7 @ 1.888.409.2849. Please have your account number and card information. WE DO NOT ACCEPT ACH PAYMENTS.

The City of Hackberry has contracted with the Little Elm Police Department to patrol our streets and control our crime in our City. All citations issued by Little Elm Police Department will be handled at the Little Elm Court House.
(Please read ordinances 243-17 and 244-17 under Ordinances)

Any citations issued by America Code Enforcement and All American Dogs will be handled at Hackberry City Hall.
(Please read all other ordinances under Ordinances)

##### Hackberry City Hall

[![city of Hackberry (1)](https://cityofhackberry.net/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/city-of-Hackberry-1.png "city of Hackberry (1)")](https://cityofhackberry.net/)

Hackberry is a town in Denton County,
Texas, United States. The population was
2,973 in 2020.

##### Contact Us

* [### city@cityofhackberry.net](mailto:%20city@cityofhackberry.net)
* [### (972)292-3223](tel:%209722923223)
* ### 119 Maxwell Road Frisco, Texas 75036
